channel.title: 317 [PI] help
channel.description: Hey how can i change the amount u get per steal on a thieving stall what files do i go into. Anthor question what files do i go into to change the drop rate of an item. I have almost went to every file on server. this is a 317 PI

item.title: 317 [PI] help
item.dc:creator: @hanny hanny
item.description:
@hanny wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:4, topic:401806”][quote author=hanny link=topic=498865.msg3648138#msg3648138 date=1309539167]
what file is it in, whats the tittle of the file?
[/quote]
data>config>npcdrops.cfg

and for the thieving stalls. in your file where it handles the click on objects there will be something like stealfromstalls(…) then look in thieving.java for the method and see what the amount is then change that.[/quote]

thanks man@!!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] help
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

hanny:

what file is it in, whats the tittle of the file?

data>config>npcdrops.cfg

and for the thieving stalls. in your file where it handles the click on objects there will be something like stealfromstalls(…) then look in thieving.java for the method and see what the amount is then change that.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] help
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

the stalls are in there somewhere not sure where its hard to find

the drops can be changed like this:

the less rare you want an item to be add it in more times like the coins in this example (id 995)

npcdrops.tsm
